  • Constructor Details

    • PasswordCheckerUtility

      public PasswordCheckerUtility()

  • Method Details

    • ifPasswordContainsSpecialSymbol

      public static boolean ifPasswordContainsSpecialSymbol​(java.lang.String str)

    • comparePasswordsWithReturn

      public static boolean comparePasswordsWithReturn​(java.lang.String passwordString, java.lang.String passwordConfirm)
      Parameters:
      passwordString - - string to be checked for validity
      Returns:
      - true if valid password, set up to return false if an invalid password, but throws an exception instead.
      Throws:
      application.LengthException - - thrown if length is less than 6 characters.
      NoDigitException - - thrown if no digit.
      application.NoUpperAlphaException - - thrown if no uppercase alphabetic character in the user-inputed password.
      application.NoLowerAlphaException - - thrown if no lowercase alphabetic character in the user-inputed password.
      application.InvalidSequenceException - - thrown if more than 2 of the same character.
      application.NoSpecialCharacterException - - thrown if a special character is in the user-inputed password.

    • isValidPassword

      public static boolean isValidPassword​(java.lang.String passwordString) throws application.NoLowerAlphaException, application.LengthException, application.InvalidSequenceException, application.NoUpperAlphaException, application.NoSpecialSymbolException, application.NoDigitExeption, application.NoSpecialCharacterException
      Throws:
      application.NoLowerAlphaException
      application.LengthException
      application.InvalidSequenceException
      application.NoUpperAlphaException
      application.NoSpecialSymbolException
      application.NoDigitExeption
      application.NoSpecialCharacterException

    • isWeakPassword

      public static boolean isWeakPassword​(java.lang.String passwordString)
      Parameters:
      passwordString - - string to be checked if weak password.
      Returns:
      - true if length of password is greater than or equal to 6 but less than or equal to 9.

    • getInvalidPasswords

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInvalidPasswords​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> passwords)
      Parameters:
      passwords - - arraylist of passwords to check for validity.
      Returns:
      - arraylist of invalid passwords. It will not return weak passwords.
